title: Looking for condensed typefaces
content:
Hi !

I am working on a project where I am looking for a very condensed and kind of constructed typeface. I have attached a tree reference pictures. Do anybody know typefaces similar to these?

Thank a lot,

Rune

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Web\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121725/http:/typophile.com/files/Web_logo.gif) | 1.76 KB |
| [Screen Shot 2014-06-20 at 20.51.50.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121725/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-20%20at%2020.51.50.png) | 206.14 KB |
| [Lawrence Weiner - Reduced, 1970 paint on wall.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121725/http:/typophile.com/files/Lawrence%20Weiner%20-%20Reduced,%201970%20paint%20on%20wall.jpg) | 23.82 KB |
author: RuneBS

comments.content:
Hi! i think your could try with a Univers Condensed or extra condensed, maybe a Jay gothic.  
you could also search for similar fonts at [https://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121725/https:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/ "https://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/")

Good luck
